name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Accomplished Senior DevOps Engineer with 8 years of experience, specializing in cloud infrastructure and automation using **AWS**, **Terraform**, **Ansible**, **Docker**, and **Kubernetes**. Proven track record in deploying scalable solutions, ensuring high availability, and optimizing performance across distributed systems. My strong command of **network protocols** and proficiency in **bash**, **Python**, and **Ruby** enable me to collaborate effectively with development teams, streamlining CI/CD processes and enhancing incident response capabilities.
Additionally, I possess rich experience in implementing and managing observability tools such as **Prometheus**, **Grafana**, and **Elasticsearch**, ensuring robust monitoring and logging systems that align with compliance standards. Coupled with my solid background in full-stack development, including **React**, **Next.js**, and **Node.js**, I bring a unique perspective to infrastructure management and application delivery that drives organizational success.
